      Pros

      People, innovation, legacy, commitment to the highest quality and integrity

      Cons

      High management turnover (tech company)

      Advice to Management

    Interviewing at Hewlett Packard Enterprise | HPE

    1. Featured Interview

      Helpful (4) Â 

      Cloud Software Engineer Interview

      Anonymous Employee in Santa Clara, CA
      Accepted Offer
      Positive Experience
      Average Interview

      Application

      I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at Hewlett Packard Enterprise | HPE (Santa Clara, CA) in January 2018.

      Interview

      4 onsite, in-person interviews. The questions broadly covered Cloud Computing concepts, Distributed Systems concepts, moderately difficult algorithms (two questions). Overall, it's not difficult interview. But it's not easy either. The interviewers were varying experience level and super nice.

      Interview Questions

      • 1) Design a Lyft/Uber like system.
        2) Share about Cloud Computing concepts (CAP theorem) etc. Â  Answer Question
      Hewlett Packard Enterprise | HPE 2018-09-20 22:13 PDT
    See All 1,100 Interviews
